posts.post_content: Have an awesome T207 Ed Reulbach card graded 60 ex 5 by SGC.  Very strong back and flawless front. Card would be an excellent edition to any T207 or Cub collection.  Would also be a great type card.  Asking price $135.00 first class shipping/ delivery included.  PayPal preferred.  E-mail me at [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url].  Will try to get scans added.
